l1kfpwuGklkXVKel.hint: Dwarves stand between 4 and 5 feet tall and even the smallest average about 150 pounds. Your size is Medium.

description.value:
Your dwarf character has certain hereditary traits dictated by their lineage.

Age. Dwarves are physically mature around age 20, but most consider themselves young until they reach age 50. On average, they live about 350 years.

@Embed[.Advancement.l1kfpwuGklkXVKel inline]{Size}

Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

description.short: Dwarves are a hardy people, as sturdy and solid as stone.
